about: My name is Thimna Alam born and raised in Cape Town. I obtain my matric certificate at the Centre Of Science And Technology in 2020. During that period I was also part of the Children's Radio Foundation doing a radio production course. In 2019 I also took part in a coding and robotics bootcamp at UCT under Code Space. After that I went to False Bay college and did nated electrical engineering but I did not finish. After high school I went to work part-time at Khanyile's Bakery at that time it was still opening. I did everything from baking to cashiering which is where I am currently working at on weekend as an administrator.In 2023 January to June I worked at Alpha Konnect as a lead generator - outbond calls and now I am currently a student a Life Choices Academy doing a course in web development.

education.description: I am currently enrolled at Life Choices Academy in a course of web development.

I was part of the programme for 4 years. This mainly focused on radio production skills which include radio presenting, sound engineering, reserching, script writing and community building. During my period of enrollment we won an award for Best Current Affairs and during covid- 19 I won 3rd place for Best Home Reporter.

I attended at the Centre Of Science and Technology the major subjects were - Physical sciences, Life sciences, Computer Application Technology and Pure Maths. I was also part of the Leadership Council for year 2019/2020.
I took part in a bootcamp for coding and robotics with Code space at UCT.

skills.title: Web Development
skills.experience: I have a decade of experience in web development using the following technologies: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JQuery, and Javascript. I am still building applications using the mentioned technologies.

skills.title: Database
skills.experience: I've have been working on different types of databases since 2009, both SQL-structured and document-based. I enjoy working on a database; for me, that is where the magic happens. A well-structured database is the result of data integrity and many more.

skills.title: API
skills.experience: In case we want to secure, identify, and authorize access to a user on a specific resource, we need to have an API, which is a glue between the front end and back end. We can set up a lot of features or logic, such as middleware, database configuration, JSON web tokens, and many more. For the past 7 years, I have been working on APIs using Django and ExpressJS.

skills.title: Programming
skills.experience: When it comes to programming, I have a lot to say, but I will be brief. Programming and database management are the skills that will stay with me forever, even though it is my first time to come across another programming language. It is crazy how I knew it syntax before starting coding. I have a decade of working experience on the following programming languages: C++, Python, Delphi, Javascript, VB.Net, C#, and Java. I still want to learn more about them.

testimonials.name: Rachel
testimonials.quotes: Joel never ceases to amaze me with the vast amount of knowledge he has acquired over the years in software development. He is truly a great mentor.

testimonials.name: Ruth
testimonials.quotes: Joel is a nice person. Someone who is really reliable and honest always does his work and makes sure everything is well organized.

testimonials.name: Lazola
testimonials.quotes: Joel Tshimanga Mukunya is an incredibly humble intellectual. He is an outstanding lecturer who consistently finds effective ways to ensure that everyone comprehends the content. Additionally, he has a delightful personality, making him a joy to be around.

testimonials.name: Dr. Godwin P
testimonials.quotes: I am thrilled to share my heartfelt testimonial for Joel, a remarkable former co-worker and lecturer. Joel worked under my guidance for one year during my time as Head of Curriculum and Learning at Lifechoices Academy. His expertise in C++, HTML, CSS, Vue.js, JavaScript, and Node.js is truly impressive, and he effortlessly demonstrates proficiency in these technologies. However, what truly sets Joel apart is his exceptional teaching skills. He has a natural talent for breaking down complex concepts into easily digestible bits, making the learning process enjoyable and engaging. Joel's patience and willingness to go the extra mile to ensure every student grasps the material are truly commendable. I consider myself fortunate to have learned from him, and I wholeheartedly recommend him as an outstanding educator.

projects.name: To-do List
projects.description: I built this application using HTML 5, CSS, and Javascript.

projects.name: Calculator
projects.description: This is my calculator app, and I built it using HTML 5, CSS 3, Javascript, and Bootstrap's icon. In order to validate my input element, I make use of regular expressions.

projects.name: Message believers Circle
projects.description: MBC is an application I built for my client for selling products online. I make use of Vue3 JS, MySQL, APIs, and JSON Web Tokens.

projects.name: JT Laptop
projects.description: An eCommerce site built using HTML 5, CSS, Javascript, and Bootstrap 5

projects.name: JS Portfolio
projects.description: I built my portfolio using HTML 5, CSS, Bootstrap, and Javascript. I am using JS to display my dynamic content.
